name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Developer with 8 years of industry experience specializing in **C++**, **Python**, and **Microservices** architecture. Proficient in building high-performance solutions using **React**, with hands-on expertise in **Git**, **Linux**, **Kubernetes**, and **OpenStack**. Demonstrated ability to develop robust applications following software design principles and agile methodologies, ensuring high-quality code and compliance with standards. Strong team-oriented skills complemented by effective English communication.

Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in cloud technologies, utilizing platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, and have experience with real-time data processing and machine learning implementations. My unique blend of technical acumen and leadership capabilities has driven impactful projects in both healthcare and financial sectors.

- Implemented messaging solutions with **RabbitMQ** for seamless event-driven architecture, enhancing application responsiveness and performance.
- Participated in code reviews and iterative development, ensuring adherence to best practices and incorporating feedback for software improvement.

• Engineered dynamic front-end applications leveraging **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver responsive user interfaces tailored for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Developed real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, empowering operations teams to track and analyze financial activity, identify anomalies, and generate actionable insights.
• Integrated **RabbitMQ**, and **Kafka** to build a strong event-driven architecture, facilitating asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows.
• Designed and orchestrated ETL pipelines via **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, allowing **batch** and **real-time** ingestion of financial data from various sources, enhancing data availability by **20%**.
• Implemented AI/ML-driven fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction behaviors to proactively identify suspicious activities, reducing fraud rates by **15%**.
• Constructed ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification with **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring real-time decision-making by integrating model inference directly into backend services.

● Optimized application deployment and orchestration via **Kubernetes**, enhancing resource utilization and improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
